article_title: Why Obamacare Is Unpopular With Small Business Owners

article_metadata.description: VideoObamacare is very unpopular with Americans. A recent CBS poll showed Obamacare is unfavorable by 54% to 36%; a September UConn survey reported 53% to 38% unfavorable to favorable; and CNN just reported Americans disapprove of Obamacare by 57% to 39%. But this is general population research. What about small business owners? When [...]
